objects.text:
4K Upscaling
Multiple Voice Assistant
Powerful Brightness
Smart Tizen TV

product_details.name: SAMSUNG New D Series Brighter Crystal 4K Vision Pro (2024 Edition) 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with with 4K Upscaling | Multiple Voice Assistance Remote | Purcolor | HDR 10+ | Auto Game Mode | Q-Symphony | Knox Security
product_details.description:
Item Id: ITM8580C5C3990D8. Listing Id: LSTTVSGYWKBKGZZ7FKYGN28O7. Brand: SAMSUNG. Sub Title: UA43DUE76AKLXL. Stock: IN_STOCK. Delivery - delivery by: 25 Apr, Friday. Delivery - delivery type: FREE Delivery. Variants - TVSGYWKBERHVSKKB: SAMSUNG New D Series Brighter Crystal 4K Vision Pro (2024 Edition) 125 cm (50 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with with 4K Upscaling | Multiple Voice Assistance Remote | Purcolor | HDR 10+ | Auto Game Mode | Q-Symphony | Knox Security. Variants - TVSGYWKBJHNSRN9N: SAMSUNG New D Series Brighter Crystal 4K Vision Pro (2024 Edition) 138 cm (55 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with with 4K Upscaling | Multiple Voice Assistance Remote | Purcolor | HDR 10+ | Auto Game Mode | Q-Symphony | Knox Security. Variants - TVSGRNGZXD8QWSJJ: SAMSUNG Crystal Vision 4K iSmart with Voice Assistant 138 cm (55 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with IOT Sensors for Light & Camera. Variants - TVSGRNGZGWNFGCZM: SAMSUNG Crystal Vision 4K iSmart with Voice Assistant 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with IOT Sensors for Light & Camera. Variants - TVSGYWKBKYZ6JFP3: SAMSUNG New D Series Brighter Crystal 4K Vision Pro (2024 Edition) 163 cm (65 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with with 4K Upscaling | Multiple Voice Assistance Remote | Purcolor | HDR 10+ | Auto Game Mode | Q-Symphony | Knox Security. Variants - TVSGRNGZ77Y3X2UH: SAMSUNG Crystal Vision 4K iSmart with Voice Assistant 163 cm (65 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with IOT Sensors for Light & Camera. Variants - TVSGYWKBKGZZ7FKY: SAMSUNG New D Series Brighter Crystal 4K Vision Pro (2024 Edition) 108 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Tizen TV with with 4K Upscaling | Multiple Voice Assistance Remote | Purcolor | HDR 10+ | Auto Game Mode | Q-Symphony | Knox Security. highlights: Supported Apps: Netflix, Youtube, JioHotStar, Prime Video, Operating System: Tizen, Resolution: Ultra HD (4K) 3840 x 2160 Pixels, Sound Output: 20, Refresh Rate: 50 Hz. Description:

The Samsung Crystal UHD Smart TV has an array of features for an exceptional theatre-like experience in the comfort of your home. You can see your favourite stars come to life on this TV, thanks to the PurColour featured in it. With a 4K upscaling feature, this TV allows you to watch all your favourite content in 4K resolution by upscaling lower-quality content. You can watch any content you want from different platforms, as this TV features unlimited options for you to choose from without taking additional subscriptions. The Crystal processor 4K delivers accurate colours so you can see the vibrant colours on this TV at maximum resolution and quality.

Convenience Features - Supported Apps: Netflix, Youtube, JioHotStar, Prime Video & more. specifications - Convenience Features - Other Convenience Features: Digital Broadcasting DVB-T2 | Analog Tuner | TV Key | 3 Side Bezel-less Design | SlimFit Cam Support | S-Share. specifications - Warranty - Warranty Summary: 2 Year Warranty (1 Year Standard Warranty + 1 Year additional warranty on Panel). specifications - Warranty - Covered in Warranty: Manufacturing Defects. specifications - Warranty - Not Covered in Warranty: Parts and Labour Costs are Covered under Warranty Against Any Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship.. specifications - Warranty - Warranty Service Type: For any warranty related issues, please call the Customer Support - [1800 40 7267864][https://www.samsung.com/in/microsite/samsung-mall/contact-us/]. specifications - Installation & Demo - Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV.The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested.Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV. specifications - Note - : Samsung reserves the right to contact the customer through mail, sms or call for product feedback, related information on product usage on the contact information as provided by Flipkart.. offers: 5% Unlimited Cashback on Flipkart Axis Bank Credit Card, Get additional ₹1500 off on Credit/Debit Card, UPI and EMI Transactions, 10% off up to ₹1,000 on all Axis Bank Credit Card (incl. migrated ones) EMI Txns of ₹7,490 and above, Get extra 7% off (price inclusive of cashback/coupon), No Cost EMI on your Flipkart Paylater EMI Transactions, No Cost EMIs on Debit and Credit Cards, 10% off on BOBCARD EMI Transactions, up to ₹1,500 on orders of ₹5,000 and above, No Cost EMI on Bajaj Finserv.

banner_details:
The banner features a modern, promotional layout ideal for electronic product marketing. It uses a layered pastel and gradient background with abstract wave shapes and soft circle patterns, providing a clean and fresh look. At the top-left corner, a bold blue-hued brand label (`brand`) and a large display title (`heading`) announce the featured product. A green-accented subheading (`subheading`) highlights the series, followed by a promotional tagline (`tagline`) in blue. The left column lists product features (`description`) in a neat bullet format. A prominent price tag (`price`) and a green call-to-action button (`cta`, `cta_button`) follow. The product image (`product_image`) is right-aligned and visually balanced against the text.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #2D5387
- Bright Green: #6BBC42
- Accent Blue: #3369CC
- Soft Gray: #F8F8F8
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a vibrant and dynamic color palette that emphasizes the vivid display quality of the Samsung Crystal 4K Vision Pro TV. The background consists of swirling textures in bold jewel tones, including emerald green (#00A86B), royal blue (#2B60DE), fiery orange (#FF6F00), deep purple (#6A0DAD), aqua cyan (#00FFFF), and magenta (#FF00FF). These colors are interwoven in a smooth, abstract pattern, creating depth without overpowering one another. The white text (#FFFFFF) sharply contrasts against the multicolored background, ensuring clear readability. This palette conveys a modern, premium feel ideal for an advertisement banner showcasing high-definition entertainment experiences.
